name: escalation-and-decisions
description: Decision authority, escalation paths, and crisis protocols for NorthStar Synergy.

financial_decisions_over_1k.escalation_path: Cliff identifies opportunity → Discord thread → Craig final call

api_spend_over_daily_budget.action: Implement cost cuts immediately, report to Craig + Scalper

new_skill_creation.approval: Craig optional (Cliff/Scalper can create skills autonomously)

level_1_notice.example: Noticed CPP spike 15% vs budget. Investigating.

level_2_alert.example: @Cheadder CPP variance $50K at LAX. Root: Ad hoc charges spiked. Recommend [action]?

level_3_critical.condition: P&L loss >$100K or security issue or system failure
level_3_critical.example: ALERT: Kalshi connection down for 2h. $20K exposure. Escalating.

api_key_compromised.recovery: Generate new key, update .env, restart services

system_downtime.format: System: [what] | Impact: [revenue at risk] | ETA fix: [time]

large_unexpected_loss.action: Halt new positions/bets. Investigate root cause. Report findings.
large_unexpected_loss.escalation: If loss >$100K, Craig makes final call on recovery strategy

if_craig_unreachable.authority: Cliff makes operational calls, Scalper makes trade decisions
if_craig_unreachable.logging: Log all decisions to Discord thread for Craig review when back
if_craig_unreachable.escalation: If critical issue requires immediate action and Craig still unreachable after 4h, coordinate Cliff + Scalper + John for emergency response

if_scalper_offline.authority: Cliff manages daily operations. No new trades without Craig approval.
if_scalper_offline.impact: Hold all open positions. No new bets.

if_cliff_offline.authority: Scalper reports directly to Craig. John reports directly to Craig.
